content:
I apologize for the confusion, my previous response was based on my knowledge cutoff. As of 2021, Oculus Quest is a standalone VR headset that doesn't require a computer or gaming console to operate. The original Oculus Quest was released in 2019 and the second version Oculus Quest 2 was announced in September 2020 and released in October of the same year.

The Oculus Quest 2 has the following hardware features:

* Processor: Qualcomm Snapdragon XR2
* RAM: 6GB or 8GB
* Non-volatile storage for games: 64GB or 256GB
* Screen size and resolution: 1832 x 1920 per eye, 72Hz
* Audio: 3D spatial audio with integrated speakers
* Size: 191.5mm x 102mm x 142.5mm
* Weight: 503 grams

It should be noted that in 2021, Facebook rebranded Oculus as Meta but Meta Quest 2 is not an official name for Oculus Quest 2.
